name: Undead Apocalypse
description:
Undead Apocalypse: An Immersive FPS Wave based Survival Shooter.

Description:

The world has gone to shit and you are one of the few remaining survivours on the planet, gear up and take on the hordes of undead for as long as possible.

Controls:

W,A,S,D = Move Player

Mouse = Look Around

Space = Jump

Left Shift = Run

F = Flashlight

1 = Equip Melee

2 = Equip Gun

E = Interact / Use Perk / Buy Ammo / Unlock Area
